name: Ad Astrum Sum
description:
While being hunted, you find yourself leaking energy from your spaceship. Enemies spawn around you! Destroy your enemies to pick up some extra energy. Unfortunately shooting requires additional energy...

Can you reach your HOME?

Jam notes

  • My try at a spacey shooter.
  • Took me a while to get the radar working properly. 
  • Originally added some target locking but that wasn't much fun so I enlarged the hitboxes a bit to compensate.
  • The conclusion is inevitable.

(no sound, no time)
